en: The villagers were displaced by the construction of a dam.
tr: Baraj inşaatı yüzünden köylüler yerlerinden edildi.

en: There was a water mill below the dam.
tr: Barajın altında bir su değirmeni vardı.

en: The dam gave way and sent a great flush of water down the valley.
tr: Baraj yıkıldı ve vadiye büyük bir su boşaldı.

en: Pipe down, otherwise you will be hauled out.
Tama sometimes goes for a walk by himself.
tr: Tama bazen tek başına yürüyüşe çıkar.

en: Onions cook more quickly than potatoes.
Sometimes her free manner seems rude.
It's no crime to skip breakfast once in a while.
tr: Arada bir kahvaltıyı atlamak suç değil.

en: It's no crime to just idle the whole day once in a while.
tr: Arada bir bütün gün yan gelip yatmak suç değil.

en: You can't just work all day every day. You need to take a vacation once in a while.
tr: Her gün çalışılmaz. Arada bir tatil yapman lazım.

en: Sometimes it's good for a married couple to go to a hot spring together—just the two of them.
tr: Bazen evli bir çiftin baş başa kaplıcaya gitmesi iyi gelir.

en: Use your head for a change.
Once in a while, I visit the theater.
Why don't you dine out with me for a change?
tr: Bir değişiklik olsun diye benimle yemeğe çıksana?

en: It's okay to take it easy sometimes.
You need to enjoy yourself and have fun once in a while.
tr: Ara sıra eğlenip keyfine bakman lazım.

en: How about dining out for a change?
tr: Bir değişiklik olsun, dışarıda yemeğe çıkmaya ne dersin?

en: Get out and have good clean fun once in a while.
tr: Ara sıra dışarı çıkıp güzelce eğlen.

en: Let's dine out for a change.
Come and see me once in a while.
Once in a while, the prophet indulges in fantasy.
tr: Ara sıra peygamber de hayal kurar.

en: More have repented speech than silence.
tr: Konuşmaktan pişman olan, susmaktan pişman olandan daha çoktur.

en: It happened that her husband was a dentist.
It happened that I was in her room.
It happened that I knew her by sight.
It so happened that they were not there.
It happened that he was ill.
It chances that he is off duty today.
It happened that he was out.
It fell out that he could not come in time.
It happened that I met Mr Uno on the street.
That topic is too intimate to share with casual acquaintances.
tr: O konu, sıradan tanıdıklarla paylaşmak için çok özel.

en: As it happened, I had no money with me.
It happened that we met at the station.
It happened that we were in London.
It happened that I met her in Tokyo.
I chanced to see him in town.
As it happens, I have left the book at home.
He was evidently surprised when he came across me.
It so happens that today is my birthday.
tr: Ne tesadüf ki bugün benim doğum günüm.

en: Mike happened to have been absent from school.
I had a chance to meet him in Paris.
It happened that the train was delayed on account of snow.
It so happened that he was absent from school that day.
It happened that the day was my birthday.
tr: Tesadüfen o gün benim doğum günümdü.

en: There happened to be a train accident early that morning.
tr: O sabah erken saatlerde bir tren kazası olmuş.

en: It happened that I met her at the station yesterday.
It so happened that I had no money with me.
It happened that I sat next to her at a meeting.
tr: Bir toplantıda tesadüfen onun yanına oturdum.

en: Just take my word for it.
You can't make an omelet without breaking eggs.
tr: Fedakarlık yapmadan bir şey elde edemezsin.

en: Stop shooting the breeze and get to work!
tr: Boş yapmayı bırak da işine bak!

en: It is likely to rain tomorrow.
It is probable that she will come.
Perhaps she doesn't remember my birthday.
I should say he is a little angry.
Maybe the impulse was working upon her subconscious.
They'll probably come by car.
Maybe he will be a good teacher.
The chances are that he will succeed.
The chances are that he will win.
There is a chance that he will pass the exam.
He will probably forget to return my book.
tr: Büyük ihtimalle kitabımı geri vermeyi unutacak.

en: It may be that he will never be famous.
tr: Belki de hiçbir zaman ünlü olmayacak.

en: Probably he will come soon.
Chances are that he has not heard the news yet.
It is possible that he may know the fact.
It is likely that he has made such a careless mistake.
tr: Büyük ihtimalle böyle dikkatsiz bir hata yapmıştır.

en: It is probable that he forgot about it.
He may well be right.
I guess that would be all right.
The chances are that the boss will send you to California.
tr: Büyük ihtimalle patron seni Kaliforniya'ya gönderecek.

en: Possibly, the accident will delay his arrival.
Possibly the factory will be closed down next week.
Perhaps it will rain in the afternoon.
Doubtless you have heard the news.
The tea leaves all point to a merger, if you ask me.
tr: Bana sorarsan, her şey birleşmeyi gösteriyor.

en: It's going to rain.
Maybe, but I can't catch the drift of even simple situations.
tr: Belki, ama basit durumları bile kavrayamıyorum.

en: Maybe, but he wants me to stop cold turkey.
tr: Belki, ama o benden birdenbire bırakmamı istiyor.

en: I guess that's just the way the cookie crumbles.
In all probability, the cabinet will fall.
In all probability, the money will not be paid.
I dare say you are right.
Maybe he has lots of girlfriends.
I should say he won't come.
The chances are that you can pass the test.
I've reserved a double.
I'd like a double room.
I'd like a double with a bath.
Double, please.
You're tough.
Loose jackets are the latest fad.
I have been there scores of times.
You do such a thing once too often and get punished.
tr: Böyle bir şeyi bir daha yaparsan cezalandırılırsın.

en: Why don't you give up smoking?
Each package contains a score of cigarettes.
I want to get cigarettes.
67% of those who never smoked said they worried about the health effects of passive smoking.
tr: Hiç sigara içmeyenlerin %67'si, pasif içiciliğin sağlık üzerindeki etkileri konusunda endişe duyduklarını belirtti.

en: I wish I could give up smoking.
Put out your cigarette. Smoking's not permitted here.
tr: Sigaranı söndür. Burada sigara içmek yasak.

en: You must stop smoking.
You will live longer if you don't smoke.
Don't you smoke?
I'd rather you didn't smoke so much.
tr: Bu kadar çok sigara içmesen iyi olur.

en: Would you mind not smoking?
Do you mind my smoking?
Smoking is permitted.
Do you mind if I smoke?
I don't mind if you smoke.
tr: Sigara içmen benim için sorun değil.

en: Would you mind if I smoke?
The number of people who smoke is increasing, so cancer will soon be the most common cause of death.
tr: Sigara içenlerin sayısı arttığı için, kanser yakında en yaygın ölüm nedeni haline gelecek.

en: Stop smoking.
It is often pointed out that smoking is a danger to health.
tr: Sigaranın sağlığa zararlı olduğu sıkça söylenir.

en: Smoking does you harm.
It is not good for the health to smoke too much.
tr: Çok sigara içmek sağlığa iyi değil.

en: He made a resolve to stop smoking.
To give up smoking is not easy, but you should for the sake of your health.
tr: Sigarayı bırakmak kolay değil ama sağlığın için bırakmalısın.

en: I long for a smoke.
You'd better give up smoking.
If George doesn't stop smoking, he will run the risk of developing lung cancer.
tr: George sigarayı bırakmazsa, akciğer kanserine yakalanma riski var.

en: Please give up smoking.
Smokers are asked to occupy the rear seats.
Let me have a cigarette.
Smoking does much harm but no good.
tr: Sigara çok zararlı, hiç faydası yok.

en: For thy sake, tobacco, I would do anything but die.
tr: Tütün, senin uğruna ölmekten başka her şeyi yaparım.

en: Smoking has affected his health.
Tobacco acts on the brain.
You must not smoke.
Keep in mind that smoking is not good for your health.
The argument that smoking is injurious has become accepted.
tr: Sigaranın zararlı olduğu görüşü kabul edildi.

en: Smoking is dangerous to health.
It goes without saying that smoking is bad for the health.
tr: Sigaranın sağlığa zararlı olduğu zaten belli.

en: Smoking is not good for the health.
Smoking is bad for your health.
I don't smoke.
I give my pledge that I will quit smoking.
He says he will not give up smoking.
I prefer cigarettes smoked on the porch.
It's hard to shake the smoking habit.
You are requested not to smoke.
Would you mind if I smoked?
You should smoke less.
Excessive smoking will injure your health.
Would you please put out your cigarette?
Cigarette smoke fouls the air in a room.
Tobacco smoke is productive of cancer.
A new tax has been imposed on cigarettes.
There is a heavy tax on tobacco.
Let this smoky air out of the room and let some fresh air in.
tr: Bu dumanlı havayı dışarı çıkar, biraz temiz hava gelsin.

en: Sometimes I smoke just to give my hands something to do.
tr: Bazen sırf ellerim boş kalmasın diye sigara içerim.

en: Every time cigarettes go up in price, many people try to give up smoking.
tr: Sigara fiyatları her arttığında, birçok kişi sigarayı bırakmaya çalışır.

en: I was aching for a cigarette.
Please forget this, for the love of God.
Danny has no sense of beauty.
I want to study abroad, even if my parents are against it.
tr: Ailem karşı çıksa bile yurt dışında okumak istiyorum.

en: I would keep waiting for you if I had to stay awake past midnight.
tr: Gece yarısından sonra uyanık kalmam gerekse de seni beklerdim.

en: I will go even if it rains tomorrow.
Even if you are busy, you should keep your promise.
I don't mind even if she doesn't come.
Even if she comes to see me, tell her I am not at home.
tr: Beni görmeye gelse bile, evde olmadığımı söyle.

en: Whatever she says, I don't believe her.
Even if he is busy, he will come.
I will be friendly to him even if he doesn't like me.
tr: Beni sevmese bile ona iyi davranırım.

en: Don't trust him, whatever he says.
No matter what he says, I'll never believe him again.
tr: Ne derse desin, ona bir daha asla inanmam.

en: She believes him, whatever he says.
Let him be a great statesman, I don't admire him.
tr: Büyük bir devlet adamı olsa da ona hayranlık duymuyorum.

en: Even if he doesn't come here, I'll go on waiting for him.
tr: Buraya gelmese bile onu beklemeye devam edeceğim.

en: I have to go even if it rains cats and dogs.
tr: Bardaktan boşanırcasına yağsa bile gitmem gerek.

en: Even if pigs were to fly in the air, I would believe her.
I will go, be the weather what it may.
Whomever you may ask, you can't get a satisfactory answer.
tr: Kime sorarsan sor, tatmin edici bir cevap alamazsın.

en: Whoever telephones, tell him I'm out.
tr: Kim ararsa arasın, dışarıda olduğumu söyle.

en: No matter who says so, I don't believe it.
Whoever may say so, I don't believe it.
Even if there is a convention, I shouldn't ask them for so much money.
tr: Bir anlaşma olsa bile, onlardan bu kadar çok para istememeliyim.

en: I will go even if it should rain heavily.
Even if the sun were to rise in the west, I would not change my mind.
tr: Güneş batıdan doğsa bile fikrimi değiştirmem.

en: If the sun were to rise in the west, I would never agree to your plan.
tr: Güneş batıdan doğsa bile planını asla kabul etmem.

en: If the sun were to rise in the west, I would not break my word.
tr: Güneş batıdan doğsa bile sözümden dönmem.

en: I always buy a top quality product even if it is slightly more expensive.
tr: Biraz daha pahalı olsa bile hep en kaliteli ürünü alırım.

en: I have a watch that is nice, if not new.
tr: Yeni olmasa da güzel bir saatim var.

en: A watered down compromise resolution is better than none at all.
tr: Sulu bir uzlaşma kararı, hiç olmamasından iyidir.

en: If he fails, so what?
Even if you have your own way, you will not always be successful.
tr: Kendi bildiğini yapsan bile her zaman başarılı olamazsın.

en: If not confidently, at least hopefully.
tr: Özgüvenle olmasa da, en azından umutla.

en: If I am dull, I am at least industrious.
Even if we do this, it will be another sixty years before the Antarctic ozone hole is repaired.
tr: Bunu yapsak bile, Antarktika'daki ozon deliğinin tamir edilmesi altmış yıl daha sürecek.

en: Even though I was right, he got the best of me.
tr: Haklı olsam da beni alt etti.

en: Even if I am wrong, you are not quite right.
tr: Ben haksız olsam bile, sen de tam haklı değilsin.

en: Even if he is in trouble, Mac is always optimistic.
tr: Mac başı dertte olsa bile her zaman iyimserdir.

en: You have another chance even if you fail this time.
tr: Bu sefer başarısız olsan bile başka bir şansın var.

en: All people can become friends, even if their languages and customs are different.
tr: Dilleri ve gelenekleri farklı olsa bile bütün insanlar arkadaş olabilir.

en: Even if you make great efforts, you won't be able to achieve it.
tr: Ne kadar çabalarsan çabala, bunu başaramazsın.

en: Granting you were drunk, I cannot excuse you.
tr: Sarhoş olduğunu kabul etsem bile seni affedemem.

en: Even if you stop me, I won't change my mind.
Whatever you may say, I will not change my opinion.
Even if you don't like music, you'll enjoy his concert.
tr: Müziği sevmesen bile konserinden keyif alırsın.

en: He didn't like to ask for help even if he was starving.
tr: Açlıktan ölse bile yardım istemeyi sevmezdi.

en: Even though he is learned, I can't respect him.
tr: Ne kadar bilgili olsa da ona saygı duyamam.

en: No matter how cold it is outside, the rooms are comfortably heated.
tr: Dışarısı ne kadar soğuk olursa olsun, odalar gayet sıcak.

en: I'll follow you, come hell or high water.
tr: Ne olursa olsun, seni takip ederim.

en: Go through fire and water.
Even if I have to sell my house, I'll keep my business going.
tr: Evimi satmak zorunda kalsam bile işimi sürdüreceğim.

en: Live where she may, she always enjoys her surroundings.
tr: Nerede yaşarsa yaşasın, çevresinden her zaman keyif alır.

en: No matter what you may do, you must do your best.
tr: Ne yaparsan yap, elinden gelenin en iyisini yapmalısın.

en: Even when she thought about something else, ideas of death returned to her mind.
tr: Başka bir şey düşünse bile, ölüm fikirleri aklına geliyordu.

en: Whatever happens, you must keep calm.
No matter what may happen, I am always prepared for it.
tr: Ne olursa olsun, buna her zaman hazırım.

en: Don't change your plans, whatever happens.
